traits.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the elephant can make one Stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (4d8 + 7 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Stomp
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. 29 (4d10 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) psychic damage.
